Query Korean census data by admin code (province or municipality) and year

Source: R/anycensus.R
anycensusk.Rd

Query Korean census data by admin code (province or municipality) and year

anycensusk(
  codes = NULL,
  type = c("population", "tax", "mortality"),
  year = 2020,
  level = c("adm1", "adm2")
)

Arguments

codes

Integer or character vector of admin codes (e.g. 11, 26) or admin names (e.g. "Seoul").

type

character: "population", "tax", or "mortality". Defaults to "population".

year

Integer: 2020.

level

Character: "adm1" for province-level or "adm2" for municipal-level. Defaults to "adm2".

Value

A data.frame object containing census data for the specified codes and year.

Examples

anycensusk(codes = "21", type = "mortality")
#> # A tibble: 16 × 9
#>     year adm1  adm2         adm2_other adm2_code type     `All causes_total_p1p`
